DOC.brief_summary: In acromegaly , nearly 40 % patient fail control GH/IGF-I level somatostatin analogue ( SA ) . Dopaminergic agonist ( DA ) even less effective , combination therapy SA DA normalize IGF-I level 33-56 % patient short-term study . This study design evaluate short long term efficacy cabergoline control IGF-I level acromegalic patient receive octreotide .
DOC.brief_title: Short Long Term Efficacy Combined Cabergoline Octreotide Treatment Acromegalic Patients
DOC.criteria: Active disease , octreotide treatment least 9 month Cabergoline allergy
